name: 莉安·哈奇森

last_movies.title: 杰西卡·琼斯 第二季

introduction: LeeAnne originally hails from Athens, GA. She's a recipient of the Charles Bowden Award from New Dramatists, for her exceptional collaboration with playwrights toward the creation of new work for the theatre. Since 2007, she has been a member of the Actors Center Workshop Company, a creative home for professional actors to continue evolving their craft in relation to their growth as human beings. LeeAnne has played Blanche in A STREETCAR NAMED DESIRE (opposite Joe Manganiello as Stanley), Barbara Weston in AUGUST O'SAGE COUNTY (with Broadway's Susanne Marley as Violet), Frankie in McNally's FRANKIE & JOHNNY IN THE CLAIR DE LUNE (opposite her remarkable husband Grant Neale), and Susie Schmidt in the film ONE FALL, with Zoe McLellan and Dominic Fumusa. LeeAnne is currently playing Diane in THE OTHER F WORD, a new dramatic comedy by award-winning filmmaker Caytha Jentis.
